title.en: Ura Aka DD, Mesuiki Kaihatsu Saremashita.

altTitles.ja: 裏アカDD、メスイキ開発されました。

altTitles.en: Anon User "College Student" is Being Trained to Dry Orgasm.

description.en: “At this rate, you’ll even be able to dry orgasm soon.” Riku, a college student, uploads suggestive photos through an anonymous account as a hobby. Getting a steady amount of likes and reaching 10,000 followers, he discovers an unpleasant account! An account called “Trainer” run by Kento is soaring in popularity in social media!? And so, an exchange began out of curiosity… under the guise of undergoing training for content to upload on social media! …at least that’s what he thought, when he was cumming in the blink of an eye…! He thought, damn, I can’t get enough… and now, Kento is being assigned to his college…!?
